channel.title: Itemassistant ,317 PI
channel.description:
src\server\model\items\ItemAssistant.java:18: incompatible types found : boolean required: int return false; ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .
wtf i do?? thnkz

item.title: Itemassistant ,317 PI
item.dc:creator: @Ineverbow Ineverbow
item.description:
@Ineverbow wrote:

[quote=“madgamer, post:4, topic:356239”]public int getBankAmount(int item) { if(c.inTrade) { c.sendMessage("You can't store items while trading!"); return 0; } int count = 0; for (int j = 0; j < c.bankItems.length; j++) { if (c.bankItems[j] == item + 1) { count += c.bankItemsN[j]; } } return count; }[/quote]

Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
Press any key to continue . . .

Thankz, i wud rep if i could

item.title: Itemassistant ,317 PI
item.dc:creator: @madgamer madgamer
item.description:
@madgamer wrote:

public int getBankAmount(int item) { if(c.inTrade) { c.sendMessage("You can't store items while trading!"); return 0; } int count = 0; for (int j = 0; j < c.bankItems.length; j++) { if (c.bankItems[j] == item + 1) { count += c.bankItemsN[j]; } } return count; }

item.description:
@Ineverbow wrote:

wow,thanks for so quick reply

   public int getBankAmount(int item) {
                if(c.inTrade) {
        c.sendMessage("You can't store items while trading!");
     return false;
     }
        int count = 0;   
         for (int j = 0; j < c.bankItems.length; j++) {
            if (c.bankItems[j] == item + 1) {
        count += c.bankItemsN[j];
     }     
  }
  return count;

}

item.title: Itemassistant ,317 PI
item.dc:creator: @Project_Realm Project Realm
item.description:
@Project_Realm wrote:

That error means you are trying to return a boolean (false, in this case) where the method needs an int (a number) to be returned. Post the method code that is creating the error here.

Read full topic
